thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Euro Cervantes Increases Its 2018 Guidance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Euro Cervantes Increases Its 2018 Guidance
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - EURO CERVANTES SOCIMI SA:
* SAID ON THURSDAY REVISED ITS FY 2018 FINANCIAL GUIDANCE * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE AT 5.3 MILLION EUROS VERSUS PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF 0.6 MILLION EUROS
* SEES FY 2018 NET LOSS AT 21.4 MILLION EUROS VERSUS PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF NET LOSS OF 26.0 MILLION EUROS
Source text: bit.ly/2BNDMIs
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
